properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 10:07AM CST until January 12 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a

* Flood Warning for...
Webster County in southwestern Missouri...
Wright County in southwestern Missouri...
Taney County in southwestern Missouri...
Howell County in south central Missouri...
Barry County in southwestern Missouri...
Ozark County in southwestern Missouri...
Shannon County in south central Missouri...
Douglas County in southwestern Missouri...
Christian County in southwestern Missouri...
Stone County in southwestern Missouri...
Texas County in south central Missouri...
Southeastern Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri...
Greene County in southwestern Missouri...
Oregon County in south central Missouri...

* Until 1000 AM CST Sunday.

* At 1005 AM CST, the Department of Transportation reported many
flooded low water crossing across the area. Rainfall amounts from
the past couple of days of 2 to over 4 inches in some locations
has occurred, which has led to the flooding.  The flooded low
lying areas will likely continue into Sunday.

* Creeks, streams, and low water crossings will be especially
susceptible to the dangers of flooding.
Locations in the warning include...
Springfield...                    Nixa...
Ozark...                          Republic...
West Plains...                    Branson...
Table Rock State Park...          Roaring River State Park...
Echo Bluff State Park...          Current River State Park...
Grand Gulf State Park...          Marshfield...
Battlefield...                    Willard...
Mountain Grove...                 Hollister...
Cassville...                      Licking...
Rogersville...                    Silver Dollar City...

This warning includes but is not limited to the following low water
crossings...
Route E north of Highway 38 at The Gasconade River...
Route CC west of Fair Grove at The Pomme De Terre River...
Highway 13 at Railey Creek near Reeds Spring...
Highway 13 at Pine Run northwest of Galena...
and Route U at Pedelo Creek northeast of Sparta.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

A Flood Warning means that flooding is imminent or occurring. All
interested parties should take necessary precautions immediately.
